name: @dWords remover for Gmail - ver. 0.5 (Sep 8 2009)
description:
removes AdWords context adverts ("Sponsored Links") from Gmail web mailbox: plain & simple

if you appreciate this style and think that it meets the task - rate it with five stars please

ver. 0.1
initial release
ver. 0.2
corrected links to navigation tools in sidebar - previous version removed links completly, now they are changed into icons over the mail container
ver. 0.3 - Jul 4 2009
revised and corrected after Gmail update
ver. 0.4 - Aug 6 2009
minor correction
ver. 0.5 - Sep 8 2009
corrected long titles overlapping
